translated: The Dhamma Section in Pairs according to Antecedents
The Section on Pairs Connected with a Text

original: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na gantha sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a text as condition there arises what is connected with a text. As condition.🔽With what is connected with a text as condition there arises what is not connected with a text. As condition.

original: Naganthasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ ca na gantha vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā  uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With what is connected with a text as condition there arise what is connected with a text and what is not connected with a text. As condition.

original: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na gantha vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With what is not connected with a text as condition there arises what is not connected with a text. As condition.🔽With what is not connected with a text as condition there arises what is connected with a text. As condition.

original: Naganthavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ ca na gantha vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā 🔽uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With what is not connected with a text as condition there arise what is connected with a text and what is not connected with a text. As condition.

original: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na gantha sampayuttañca na gantha vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ  uppajjati hetu paccayā na gantha sampayuttañca na gantha vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a factor associated with grasping and a factor not associated with grasping, a factor associated with grasping …🔽Dependent on a factor associated with grasping and a factor not associated with grasping, a factor not associated with grasping …

original: naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na gantha vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na gantha sampayuttañca na gantha vippayuttañca  dhammam paṭicca na gantha sampayutto ca na gantha vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: Dependent on a factor associated with grasping and a factor not associated with grasping, a factor associated with grasping and a factor not associated with grasping … (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
translated: Nine in the case of root cause; six in the case of object; nine in the case of predominance. … One in the case of kamma result; … Nine in the case of the unformed.
